name: leadsfire/click-tracker
description: Self-hosted click tracking and campaign management system with ML-ready architecture

post-install-cmd:
@php -r "file_put_contents('vendor/.htaccess', '<IfModule mod_authz_core.c>
    Require all denied
</IfModule>
<IfModule !mod_authz_core.c>
    Order deny,allow
    Deny from all
</IfModule>
');"
post-update-cmd:
@php -r "file_put_contents('vendor/.htaccess', '<IfModule mod_authz_core.c>
    Require all denied
</IfModule>
<IfModule !mod_authz_core.c>
    Order deny,allow
    Deny from all
</IfModule>
');"
security-check: @php -r "echo 'Checking file permissions...\n'; $files = ['.env' => '640', 'config/app.php' => '640', 'config/database.php' => '640']; foreach ($files as $f => $p) { if (file_exists($f)) { $perms = substr(sprintf('%o', fileperms($f)), -3); echo $f . ': ' . $perms . ($perms === $p ? ' ✓' : ' ✗ (should be ' . $p . ')') . '\n'; } }"
